name: Fixation
description:
You can never really go wrong with chocolate. There are so many combinations to have, we tried hard to create a truly unique one.  With the addition of chai powder we amplify the power of all things chocolate!  Call it a love potion. Call it an obsession. Call it on the phone. Just make sure you call it by name, Fixation. It's been a big hit at Smorgasburg all summer.  See what people are saying for yourself. 

You pay for delivery of 4 12 oz servings.  If you would like to mix & match with other flavors, please include that in the special notes section during checkout. 

If you are living in the NYC area you can put in your zip code and shipping will be free.  Please leave us a note during checkout when is the best time to deliver with you on the weekend.
